body: @pray_for_me To be fair in all the gender bending stories this author's made! All the gender bended get a helping of brainwashing or such! (The cowgirl one had those who end up cowgirl's having VERY STRONG libido's which catch a good many of them such as the two gender bended leads off guard when they're turned. I think only one didn't have those things I pointed out happen! But then that character didn't act like a complete slut so I don't think it counts!). The "Succubus body swap one" had the MC in not just a female body he was unfamiliar with obviously but a succubus one and the one raping and taming him in his old body was the Succubus in general who very much knew "all her weak points" As he said once brainwashed. Weak willed men like him are targeted because their the easiest to trick and the easiest to break in and tame once the transfer happens for the Succubi!
So this author tell me is , every man transfer to a girl became absolute slut ?
